org.vanilladb.core.storage.metadata.statistics

Class SampledHistogramBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanilladb.core.storage.metadata.statistics.SampledHistogramBuilder

  • public class SampledHistogramBuilder
extends Object
    Performs the slide-window uniform sampling on records and by using the samples, and constructs histograms with the "MaxDiff(V, A)" buckets for numeric field values and "MaxDiff(V, F)" buckets for other types of field values respectively.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SampledHistogramBuilder(Schema schema) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Histogram newMaxDiffAreaHistogram(int numBkts)
      Constructs a histogram with the "MaxDiff(V, A)" buckets for all fields.
      Histogram newMaxDiffFreqHistogram(int numBkts, int numPcts)
      Constructs a histogram with the "MaxDiff(V, F)" buckets for all fields.
      Histogram newMaxDiffHistogram(int numBkts, int numPcts)
      Constructs a histogram with the "MaxDiff(V, A)" buckets for numeric field values and "MaxDiff(V, F)" buckets for other types of field values respectively.
      void sample(Record rec)
      Keep a record as a sample, with certain probability.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SampledHistogramBuilder

        public SampledHistogramBuilder(Schema schema)

    • Method Detail

      • sample

        public void sample(Record rec)
        Keep a record as a sample, with certain probability. This method is designed to uniformly sample all records of a table under the situation where the total number of records is unknown in advance. A client should call this method when iterating through each record of a table.
        Parameters:
        rec - the record

      • newMaxDiffHistogram

        public Histogram newMaxDiffHistogram(int numBkts,
                                     int numPcts)
        Constructs a histogram with the "MaxDiff(V, A)" buckets for numeric field values and "MaxDiff(V, F)" buckets for other types of field values respectively.
        Parameters:
        numBkts - the number of buckets to construct for each field
        numPcts - the number of value percentiles in each bucket of the non-numeric fields
        Returns:
        a "MaxDiff(V, A/F)" histogram

      • newMaxDiffAreaHistogram

        public Histogram newMaxDiffAreaHistogram(int numBkts)
        Constructs a histogram with the "MaxDiff(V, A)" buckets for all fields. All fields must be numeric.
        Parameters:
        numBkts - the number of buckets to construct for each field
        Returns:
        a "MaxDiff(V, A)" histogram

      • newMaxDiffFreqHistogram

        public Histogram newMaxDiffFreqHistogram(int numBkts,
                                         int numPcts)
        Constructs a histogram with the "MaxDiff(V, F)" buckets for all fields.
        Parameters:
        numBkts - the number of buckets to construct for each field
        numPcts - the number of value percentiles in each bucket
        Returns:
        a "MaxDiff(V, F)" histogram
